title.rendered: Essential guide to online slots bonuses

content.rendered:
Online slots have exploded in popularity over the last few years with people now enjoying them on a global scale. Living in the digital age means you can enjoy playing online casino games without leaving the comfort of your home – perfect if you’re a beginner, or if you can’t play in a physical land-based casino for whatever reason.

The rapid unmatched growth of online slots like rainbow riches means there are now many different types of slots and genres from exciting and talented games developers. With the rise of online slots comes the juicy bonuses that you should take advantage of to boost your bankroll – and since there are so many online casinos out there to choose from, the bonuses get ever-more competitive.

Why You Should Take Advantage of Online Slots Bonuses

There are number of reasons why you should take full advantage of online slots bonuses. Playing video slots is fun and super entertaining, but if you can grab a bonus at the same time, well, you’re adding even more value to your play. Here’s why:

  • Great for beginners – if you’re new to slots, the game mechanics can sometimes be tricky to understand, so bonuses are a great way to learn the ropes while using bonus cash and free spins that you wouldn’t have had before.
  • You can get experimental – extra bonuses mean that you can enjoy trying new slots that you may not have considered playing with your own cash, but that you’re happy to try with bonus cash or free spins.
  • Get more bang for your buck – if you’re a recreational slots player, online slots bonuses can help you maximise your money and play time – why have 10 minutes of fun when you can double your play and have 20 minutes?
  • Increase your fun – Having extra bonus cash or free spins adds more thrills to playing slots – who doesn’t love a bonus? Some casinos even have slots tournaments where you compete with other players to win free spin bonuses – an extra level of interactive entertainment.

How to Make the Most of Online Slots Bonuses

There are many ways to get the most out of online slots bonuses. All respectable online casinos will offer their players the all-important bonuses since this is one of the big pull factors for players. Here’s what to look out for to maximise your play:

Welcome Bonuses

The most generous slot bonuses are welcome bonuses – or sign-up bonuses – which are offered to entice brand new players. Look out for some of the best offers which can reward you with up to 100% match on your deposit, up to a certain value. So, basically, you’ll be doubling your money.

Loyalty Bonuses

Online casinos offer players and potential players loyalty bonuses and promotions like extra free spins, which is an attractive offer if you’re a slots fan because you’re essentially spinning for free. Plus, you may get free spins on brand new game releases, or games that you might not have considered playing before.

VIP/High-Roller Bonuses

VIP schemes offer high rewards and big pay-outs to players who like make big deposits. If you’re a high roller who likes to play big and win big, search for competitive VIP schemes to sign up to. This way you will boost your play with fantastic rewards and exciting membership bonuses.

No-Deposit Bonuses

Although not as common as deposit bonuses, it is still possible to get no-deposit bonuses from time-to-time. These are basically free money, so keep your eyes peeled for these and grab them while you can.

Tips for Maximising Slots Bonuses

  • Shop around – look for the best reviews and search the competition for the best bonuses. Online casino Virgin Games offers their players great bonuses, has a huge selection of slots and has good customer reviews.
  • Know what you like – do you love sport-themed football slots? Or maybe you prefer classic fruit machine type slots? Or perhaps progressive jackpot slots are your thing? Having an idea of which games and genres you like can help you decide where to put your money.
  • Read the small print – online slots bonuses come with terms and conditions, so make sure you read these before taking up an offer. For example, welcome bonuses come with certain wagering requirements (the amount you must play before you can withdraw), so read up on these first before you choose the bonus that suits you.
  • Use it or lose it – most often, bonuses will be for a limited-time only so make sure you use any welcome bonus, cash-back or free spin rewards before the time runs out. Tick-tock, tick-tock…

Ready, Set, Spin

It’s clear that there are online slots bonuses out there for every type of player. Whether you’re serious about making money, or just want to make your money go further whilst having a good time, it pays to shop around and find the right bonus for you.

Online casinos cater for all different types of players from those looking for the top paying VIP scheme bonuses, to people who enjoy playing recreational and are looking for free spin rewards – there really is something for everyone. Choosing the casino and offer that suits you best will help you enjoy your play and boost your bankroll.

And most importantly, remember to have fun, don’t spend over your budget, and enjoy yourself!
